alert.note: Alert for Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 15 at 10:56PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pemiscot, western Obion and northeastern Lake Counties through 1115 PM CST... At 1056 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tiptonville, or near Reelfoot Lake State Park, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reelfoot Lake State Park, Tiptonville, Clayton, Hornbeak, Samburg, Wynnburg, Wright, Cronanville, Roneys Store, Elbridge, Sunkist Beach, Blue Bank, Proctor City, Jacksonville, Spout Springs, Mooring, Walnut Log, Grays Camp, Haynes and Lassiter Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for southeastern Missouri...and west Tennessee.
